results.name: a(n) = n XOR A193231(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16383
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences operating on polynomials in ring GF(2)[X]
program: A193231(n) = { my(x='x); subst(lift(Mod(1, 2)*subst(Pol(binary(n), x), x, 1+x)), x, 2) }; \\ From A193231
(Scheme) (define (A280507 n) (A003987bi n (A193231 n))) ;; Where A003987bi implements A003987 (bitwise-XOR).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 09 2017
